cyclone.name: HANNA
cyclone.current_location: about 405 mi ESE of Port O'Connor, Texas
cyclone.trajectory: moving west-northwest across the north-western Gulf toward the central Texas coast
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: central Texas coast (around Port O'Connor/Matagorda Bay)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Port Mansfield to High Island, Texas
weather_observation.impacted_coast: north-western Gulf Coast from south-central Louisiana westward to the lower Texas coast
weather_observation.wind: Breezy conditions with occasional gusts 20–30 mph possible in outer rainbands
weather_observation.storm_surge: Minor coastal surge around 1–2 ft along SE Louisiana marshes
weather_observation.rainfall: Periods of heavy showers; totals generally 1–3 inches near New Orleans
weather_observation.other_hazards: Elevated rip-current risk along Gulf beaches
